snippet: Over on the Media Decoder blog, Amy Chozik reports that the hosts of "Noticiero Univision," Jorge Ramos and María Elena Salinas, will urge Mitt Romney and President Obama to participate in a debate or forum for its Hispanic viewers.
abstract: Over on the Media Decoder blog, Amy Chozik reports that the hosts of "Noticiero Univision," Jorge Ramos and María Elena Salinas, will urge Mitt Romney and President Obama to participate in a debate or forum for its Hispanic viewers.

headline.main: On Univision's Nightly News, a Plea for Presidential Debate on Latino Issues
